content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my deck to have a cigarette, it was about 10minutes after 11:00pm and as i steped outside i looked up as i always do to see if i can see any shooting stars. i imediately saw a very bright light that looked like a star (brighter than venus)i thought it was a plane coming from seatac. there were no blinking lights or other colors. there was just a brightness that made it look like a star. there was no sound. clear skies.I thought for a few seconds that it was a ufo and that it knew i was watching it(when it was directly overhead). the object moved at a curve or toward the southeast above me and the harbor. the light grew dim and up and away it disapeared. i also saw a shooting star seconds after first seeing the object. the shooting star seemed to pass behind the object when it was over and north of my house.
i finished my cigarette and came inside and it was 11:15pm.
a similar event happened once before, maybe 6 to 8 monthe ago. the object came from a slightly different direction and from a lower initial visual contact and exited at the same point in the night sky.
content.summary: Object in sky directly above, very bright, moving from north curving to se heading up to space and disapearing.

content.detailedDescription: Saw 3 bright white lights in a triangle shape for approximately 2 minutes and it vanished. i was driving west on 159th street and farrell was the cross street.  to the south west of my location was the sighting.  it was monsterous!
content.summary: Saw 3 bright white lights in a triangle shape for approximately 2 minutes and it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i was at my yard coming back from the gas station down the street.
2. what made you first notice the object?
i'm a star gazer and tonight was a very clear night and u could see most of the stars that aren't ussually visible.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
a bright star, but only for a second, it was always moving when i first spotted it.
4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
the object looked like a bright star, no blinking lights on this thing from what i saw and i starred at it for a while. it moved slowly from east to west. it was a very wierd sighting, not my first of these kinds of things(i saw one very similiar almost one year ago and reported it).
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
first i didn't think much of it, but as i kept looking and seeing this wasn't the ussual aircraft i see often living by o'hare airport, and i seen them all, after a while i just kept starring to see if i could spot a red or white blinking light, noting at all.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it was weird as i know and this can be verified by the weather service that tonight was mostly a clear sky. this is why i find it hard to believe that this thing just dissapeared. i dunno maybe it did dissapear behind a cloud. i saw an airplane come right by it so this couldn't have been it. maybe it was a sattelite? ...
content.summary: Came from walking to gas station down my street, got to my house and saw a light (sphere) move slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
In the early morning of may 20, 2009 between 12am and 1am, i was laying in bed looking out the window and able to see the sky. i noticed a bright star and was looking at that when 8-10 orange circles of light appeared in the sky, lower than the star. at first my brain tried to make sense of it but nothing about the lights seemed as if they could be something familiar. (afterwards i thought it was possible that someone could've been pointing lasers at low cloud/fog cover but it couldn't have been cloudy if i could see that star.) the circles of light were spread out almost in a line and as they moved from east to west they split into two separate formations of equal numbers. as they came closer to my house i expected them to move faster but they slowed down! they then rejoined into a group and as they passed over my house they spread apart, still moving slowly and then they were out of my range of vision. 

my feeling at the time was mostly surprise. i was talking to my mate while observing this and as the circles started acting less like something recognizable, i was becoming more excited and astonished finally exclaiming in complete amazement practically pressing my nose against the glass. needless to say, he thought i was crazy as he did not see them because of not have a direct view of the window. i have never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 8-10 orange circles traveled from east to west over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving on 91 north 1/2 mile or so from exit 17a/b and something caught my eye in the sky.  i looked up and saw a rectangular object with rounded ends; it was about the color of gun metal grey, leaning towards a brown color.  it did not appear to move sideways to me, but might have been coming towards me.  approximately two seconds later the object "dipped" and the sun appeared to reflect off the object, turning the object bright white.  the object looked different as it moved/dipped, going from a rectangular object to something trapezoidal.  almost immediately after this it disappeared, as if it "blinked" or was "switched" off.

direct answers to questions:
1. i was driving back to work after picking up office supplies at staples in west springfield
2. it was a very odd color and shape compared to other things i've seen in the sky
3. at first i did not think anything of it (other than noticing its odd shape and color) until i noticed it wasn't really moving and when it then changed color (not really changing color but started to reflect the sun)
4. explained above
5. during and after i became confounded as to what i saw; i still am shaking my head about it.
content.summary: 5 second sighting of very odd looking object that disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Boyfriend and i were in backyard, looking up at the stars and noticed what we thought was a satellite traveling from south to north.  our sky is so clear and unobstructed at night, the stars, satellites, etc., are absolutely clear as a bell & even more beautiful!!  i live 22 miles outside of the city limits so i have great views.
anyway, when the "satellite" just about reached the roof of my home, which was then straight up from where we were standing in the yard, we both noticed that 2 ufo's left the initial "satellite" or "other ufo".  the supposed satellite continued northbound. the 2nd of the 3 veered off to the east in an almost arch before straightening out, and the 3rd object veered off to the west, arching and straightening out just like the 2nd did.
needless to say, we were both very excited at the sighting.  we just looked at each other and smiled, wondering if we saw the same thing..Lol
we did!  we know that satellites do not change directions like 2 of these objects did!
now we are not sure if it was a satellite that was being flanked by 2 ufo's or there were 3 ufo's traveling together and each went separate ways.
did anyone else manage to see this event?  would be interested in reading your report.
besides us and our friends, we didn't think to put this online until someone mentioned this site to us.  i love this site!  
i was in phoenix in 1997 when that huge triangle ufo went over.  took some videotape as we were driving east on i-10 but need to get it transferred to regular vhs. must unpack it and find someone to do that for me...Lol
content.summary: Ufos with satellite (or other ufo).

content.detailedDescription:
In 2008, i was visited by several appearances of a saturn-like ufo while i was living in lacy lakeview on 356 acres of land.

the land sold so i had to move.  i found a lovely space south west of the property near to a phenomena-haunted lake, rainbow lake.

on monday morning, i followed my pattern of taking tiffany on a walk. it was 6 0 6 a.M.  as i stepp'd out of my fenced yard, i look'd up at the sky and recognized saturn, venus and the crescent moon sitting between the two.

as my eyes rested on the sliver of the moon, i saw a third orb appear right above the moon and drop straight down and then begin to wander off to the south east.
the appearance was quick and didn't last long.
content.summary: Saturn drop in front of the crescent moon.

content.detailedDescription: Bright object up above plane traveling in a nw direction round and flat looking.  object just disappeared into thin air.  sky was very clear, no  clouds whatsoever in the sky.  watched if for 3 minutes before it just vanished.  the object decreased in size before disappearing. i had just got off from work at 4:pm and began riding on my bike in residential neghborood heading east when i looked up at a plane flying low and noticed a strange shaped object in the sky heading north west. moving slowly.Could not identify it to any conventional known craft. i was extremely curious and felt odd that i would have to stop riding to get a better look at this thing. it suddenly began to shrink in size and just vanished.
content.summary: Bright silvery white disc shaped object  8-10 thousand feet up heading nw.

content.detailedDescription: Went to front porch to sit and looked over the horizon. bright light appeared stationary, then 2 others appear in a row stationary. planes nearby traveled past them so i know they were stationary. they pulsed red, orange, green and yellow. once began to travel accross the sky while the others stayed stationary. my eyes followed the traveling light and spotted another group of 3 lights in a row much dimmer. i got my binoculars to see a large object (cigar shapped / maybe disk like) travel across the sky. it travel right in near a radio tower. if i held my arm out in front of me the radio tower was the size of my thumb on its side. this object was the size of 2 of my thumbs on there side. it was the larges object i have ever seen in the sky. made no sound and traveled real slow. i went to school next to dover afb in delaware and am very aware of the large cargo planes. this was no plane.
content.summary: Bright lights appeared pulsing then another large object apears nearby.

content.detailedDescription:
On clear sky days, i take pictures to record whatever may be overhead. the pictures are then zoom inspected on the computer. attached is a photo taken at 1:04 pm today (5/20/09). when you zoom in on the object, you can see sun light reflecting off of it. the blurring indicates the object was moving very fast.
camera: canon sd630 digital elph 6 mega pixel; shutter speed 15-1/1500 sec
location: my back yard
view direction: ene
note: i did not see the object in the sky .... only on the photo.
content.summary: Bell shaped ufo over indiana

content.detailedDescription: Looked out the window and noticed the outline of a moving shape, at airplane height.  no smoke or discharge.  i kept blinking to make sure i wasn't seeing things.  hovered for 15-20 seconds over our pasture while still maintaining constant jet/airplane altitude.  then it flew away at record speed.  when it shot away, my gut reaction was, "that was a ufo."
content.summary: Ovalish disc shape that was tranparent.

content.detailedDescription: On my mom's back porch in harleysville, pa we saw a boomerang shaped object about 200 yards above the yard coming towards us.It literally came out of nowhere with two bright lights almost like a huge car with headlights driving right towards us. there were 3 portholes on each end of it (one on each end and one at the front point). this was moving extremely slowly and not making a sound. as soon as it was directly above the deck it made a sharp left turn (my right) and continued moving just as slow only now there was a deep, low pitched, quiet hum that would not have been audible from inside of my house. after it turned it continued until i couldn't see it due to trees blocking my view.
content.summary: Extremely slow, low and noiseless until it turned then there was a low, deep hum.

content.detailedDescription: Late last summer my freind and i were in a field next to his house smoking a cigarette  all of a sudden this low flying object caught our eye it was diamond shaped with a cross going thru it with very bright red orange and green lights this object was just so large it would be hard to not notice it it was flying low with no sound moving from south to north then it started cirleing around the field with 2 smaller objects behind it at first we thought they were some type of plane or aircraft it wasnt it was a ufo it would fly fast then slow we couldnt belive what we were seeing i then phoned a freind who lived near us and he said he saw it to he was amazed then the object out of nowere disapered 10 minutes later what looked like a huge fire in the sky this ball of fire comes racing towards and it almost looked like it was dropping this shiny material my freind chased after it but then it disapered we tried to find what it was dropping then i found somthing the next day it was this very shinny material that looked like tinfoil or confetti but i saved in a bag and left in the woods i came back to check out and this material turned rock solid into this black looking coal object i still have it to this day i will never forget what i saw that night
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and a friend saw a very weird ufo event.

content.detailedDescription: At around 11:30am i went out back to have a smoke, i was sitting there (facing south) and i looked up and saw a large shiny silver object in the sky moving slowly from east to west. at first i thought it was a low flying jet ( i am not too far from the huntsville airport and it was large like the body of a passenger jet) but i noticed it did not have any wings and it appeared to be spinning like a windsock. i thought it was just my eyes playing tricks on me at first but as hard as i tried i could not make out any wings! it went behind a tree top, taking at least 20-30 sec to get to the other side, which in my mind seems a little slow for a large jet to be trying to land at huntsville, not to mention it was heading away from the airport. as i watched it, it seemed to be descending heading toward the tn river over decatur proper. i even thought it might be a large balloon, but a balloon that big and long would have twisted in the wind, also the wind was blowing out of the south and the object was moving wnw. it never changed direction or speed. the only odd thing was it looked like there were dark "shadows" moving from front to back which is where i got that it looked like it was spinning i guess. it was, if i had to guess about 2,000 feet up and maybe a half a mile away. i watch the planes in the area all of the time and have never seen anything like it. also i have been a witness to several other ufo events and this is not the most strange one i have seen, but it is the first daytime ufo i have seen. i waited to see if anyone else was going to report it but no one has...There has to be some other people that saw this. one other thing, i have lived here for over a year, you rarely see military jets but an f-16 flew over around 9 that morning. i have only seen one other f-16 over decatur and that was 10-11 months ago. if anyone else saw this object, please report it or let me know what it was.
content.summary: Not really sure what it was...

content.detailedDescription: My husband saw a bright light and thought it was a satalite.  an hour later it was still there.  i took my camera and set it on a tripod and took two photos.  he asked me to take photos of this light because he had never seen it there.  upon close inspection if the photo is zoomed it is not a star.  it is an object with three dimensions which radiate black rays from the top and bottom and colored gold, orange and yellow rays from the side.  the center is very white bright.  if one looks at the upper right you will see the large face of what looks like an alien being (white face) it also looks skeletal.
content.summary: Ufo in el vado nm.

content.detailedDescription:
It does not fit into astrology or the satellite tracker website. i watch all the bible movies and i think that star of bethlehem was more of a medical ship. mechanics + electronics + medical philosophies = freedom of time. i smoke so take a leather bendable case lined by cleanable glass with tiny metal chains allowing it to bend. use brushes to enter the inner lungs and retract cleaning them out as many times as you like and returning to theyre shell case after cleaning out the glass insides. use a tiny vaccumm attached and attach the tubes to the butthole. im suprised that we cannot all team up together to solve these medical issues. i also see that mechanics/computers were first neccessary to avoid the cloning of babies and unreliable parts.

imagine what the world could do for medical science if we all teamed our heads up together and philosophized mechanics/electronics/nature . one cut down the chest and stomach in one computer package with adjustable tubes will become one day. i think that god wants us to make a commitment and fall in love with our man our wife, they sure like to make cheeseburgers and squish the meat with theyre bare hands. i think that we are putting god in a snake trance and making it difficult to move on. i also believe that revelation meant the second coming was a 144,000 2000 year recall of gods friends from hell and the ocean when they were walking grass snakes / falcons or whatever else they were before they escaped the ocean. 144,000 people? everyone has to be proud and take what they got black , white, asian, or muslim. i see jesus reading a big book of medical sciences , philosophies and mechanics in vision, but i beleive that only recently was the solor cult liberty by jelousy, fear and excuses. well im back to the history channel now about the end of the world. love god the father, ]cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Star of bethlehem

content.detailedDescription: I was on msn with a freind on my top bunk looking out window discusing it, lately wether has bin weird so i was looking at the clouds and saw a triangle cloud, and three stars flashed and it was threw clouds as if there was a battel or something and then i looked out my window and saw flashes as if some one was takeing pictuers of me fromthe sky. when i first saw it i knew it was something big me and my freind i will not realse his name, know something is happening we are talking this verey minuit and it did not seem to move and my feals were noraml but i ehrd sounds on my roof and looked and saw a black figuer and freaked heart pounding and shut my window and looked again it was gone. and i lost sight becuse it flashed threw the clouds.
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Egg,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: It was flashing like a star.

content.detailedDescription: star like object moving from the north west traveling south east moving kinda slow. must of saw the object for about 60 seconds or more. the object looked like it was about 700-1000 feet in the sky. it was very brite white light. alot of others have seen them also. dont know what they are, but there is no other lights on them no red or green flashing lights and also there was no sound this object was producing silent.
content.summary: Brite star like

content.detailedDescription:
2 co-workers and myself were on our way to eat lunch when i noticed a very bright, shiny, object just ahead of us and to the right a bit. this object was approximately two to three hundred feet in the air and i guess maybe 2 blocks or so ahead of us. if you completely extended your arm out in front of you, you could use your thumb to cover the object up. it was somewhat hard for me to judge distances since i was the driving and it all happened really fast. 

anyway a tree growing along the side of north avenue momentarily obscured our view of the object. it lasted for maybe only a second or two. just long enough for my chevy silverado to pass the tree doing 45 mph. once we had completely passed the tree i was completely, totally taken by surprise! the object was now nowhere in sight. i was expecting to see some part of an airplane because we were kind of close to o���hare airport. so believing i had just seen a plane turning in the sun and its wings were reflecting after catching the sun.
but no! nothing at all! just blue sky. there was not a cloud, a bird or shiny object anywhere to be seen. i asked rob my co-worker "did you see that"? he told me yes he too had seen a very bright, shiny, flashy object in the same area of the sky. but could not explain what happened to it. it was just gone!

so not sure what we seen but we both agreed if it were a plane we should had picked it back up after passing the tree.

bruce brewer
content.summary: Noticed a shiny reflection type object ahead of us then as we were driving a tree obscured our view. once we cleared the trees the object was nowhere to be found.

content.detailedDescription:
Kenny pfeifer , is on this case - from mufon . 

11 20 pm . i went out side to smoke a cigarette. then i noticed again stationary 1/2 of a mile north from my drive way . there was a huge orange ball ! it was flashing a fire like color , twinkling star like . i went back in side and told my mother linda susan beyer , she came out side . as soon as i walked out side a huge at least 3 foot ball fields long a triangle shape craft stationary 1/2 of a mile north at green branch park in pittsgrove. it was rotating & stationary . 

as i proceeded to take a picture my cam area would not turn on . i ran back in the house to check it . i put new batteries in it . ran back out side as my mother linda beyer watch in shock . i ran north to the rode and try ed to take a picture , my [cms/tg/pd] camera the battery's drained as soon as i hit click . i could not get a shot of this object . i am really pissed because this is kind of ufo i have never seen . 

it stayed there over the tree lines then vanished . the woods in front of me lit up like the color of the sun . me and my mom got in the car and tried our best to get a picture of this thing . the dam gates of the park were locked . then about 45 minutes later i said [cms/tg/pd] it ! i went in my house and was watching angels & demons a down load copy i got from torrentz.Com . i looked out side again through my window this triangle thing . shot straight up in the air so fast like a bullet ! 

our phone lines were not working , a loud humbling noise , we were hearing out side . i ran to get my dads cell phone to call kenny pfeifer when i first seen it . but my dads cell phone was dead . 2 cars went by and stoped and i know they seen this thing ! 

i do not understand why its always at green branch park ? on upper neck r.D pittsgrove n.J 08318 . i will reassure you these are not our air !Crafts !

i do have new pictures . of some really messed up scary [cms/tg/pd] on my cam 7 mega pixels . i will send some pictures soon . i am not going to say on here what it is , for certain reasons 

somebody needs to get a crew down here and stake this place out . i am not kidden or playing games its bothering me . that people are so [cms/tg/pd] ignorant to turn there heads and say no we don't see nothing . 

excuse me for my language but there's heavy ufo crap around here / paranormal activity . it always seems to be at 10:30 to 12 am every few days . my computer is near my window that's y i see allot at night
content.summary: One triangle with 3 red lights in the back . 3 lights on the bottom . 1 circle fire ball stationary.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were traveling from statesboro to swainsboro ga at app 1030pm thursday night 11/20/08. we travel this route at least once weekly at various times of day and are very familiar with both the route and terrain.I first noticed the object in the northwest sky(the sky was very clear that night)while traveling north on highway 25. we had just crossed the 301 bypass and were heading toward the hopeulikit community that is at the intersection of us 25 and us 80. initially, i thought it was a cell tower that was being obscured at times by the tall pine trees that line the west side of hwy 25 because the light red orange light appeared to blink out at times.(also, there is a cell tower in the area that we also were able to see in the distance.) i brought the light to my friends attention and were both intrigued. as we got closer to the hopeulikit community the light changed from reddish orange to a bright white light and grew much larger and suddenly became 3 lights and blinked out. we stopped our vehicle and got out to see it we could locate and spot it again. we could not see or hear anything. we continued to travel north on highway 25 for a few miles hoping to see it again but saw nothing. we turned around to continue our drive back to swainsboro thinking that what we saw had vanished and that the excitement had ended. upon leaving the hopeulikit community the object re-appeared on the north side of hwy 80. the object appeared to now be red and was flying below the top of the pine trees. the object paralleled our vehicle and appeared to be flying at the same speed 30-35 mph. this took place for a distance of approximately 5 miles.As we entered the portal city limits at the fire dept the object crossed atop hwy 80 and again expanded to 6+ white lights however they appeared much smaller this time.My partner was able to take a picture with a cell phone.(attached) the lights blinked out and the object disappeared. we again pulled over and got out the car but could not see or hear anything. i agree to be interviewed by mufon staff but wish to remain anonymous and do not consent to be contacted by third parties. i do reserve the right to consent to be interviewed at a later date by third parties.
content.summary: Ufo spotted while traveling west between statesboro, ga and portal ga - reddish orange light turned into multiple spheres and flew along hwy 80 for approximately 6 miles then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My son shane saw 2 aliens from his bedroom window. a grey and a reptililian. it was hard to believe him but he was so sincere. he saw them several times thru the month of april and may. i got nervous about it and kept door locked etc. about 1 am an the 16 of may i checked the back door, it was not locked and opened when i checked it. in the morning this foot print was out side the back door. i must have startled it as you can see dirt flew up as it moved quickly to its left. it had rained we had had a drought and it left it's print.I am going to try and send photos. it may not work. if not i will send to mufon, or you can get them from mary margaret zimmer, i was able to mail some to her as i had her e mail address. her e mail is mm@skyscan  she can foward pics of the foot print to you . i also have a plaster of paris cast.Big claws. a foot like a chicken 3 claws in front one in back, or like an eagle, but it has a foot shape too behind the back claw with a heel. notice the dirt it threw up to the side as it lept sideways.Also it has jumped up on our roof 3x once we heard it. 3 prints are  in the front where it just jumped right up.

sincerly mike
content.summary: Alien creatures.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on the sofa watching a movie with my friend and we just happened to look out to our balcony and saw this sphere (what he describes it as/circle to me) shape pulsating with lights and we went out on to the balcony to see make sure it wasn't a plane because there was a plane stationed above/next to it or what we believe to be a plane and we watched it for 15 minutes but we heard no sound no sound whatsoever!...After 15 minutes it was just gone but during those 15 minutes the object was pulsating various beautiful colors...Red, green, orange, purple, pink and it was to big to be a star and stars don't just vanish. it did come back again but it was not there that long and it just vanished again and it was a beautiful cloudless sky tonight.
content.summary: Pulsating lights stayed in the same place for 15 min. and was just gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just turned down the street and reached an area with two driveways on the left when i saw a bright green (more dark center with a glow than a flare, but "flare" in brightness) light travel from right to left in the sky. there are trees along the side of the road, but as i was driving, "more" of the path of the ufo came into view as i cleared an area of trees (where there is about an acre of open land by the road on the left). the event lasted about 5 seconds. it moved across my field of view faster than a plane, but about a quarter the speed of a shooting star, and toward the end, because of the brightness and relative motion, seemed more like a flare just above the house about 1,000 ft away. unlike a flare, there was no smoke trail, and no "sparks." the glow and brightness was constant. the size was about that of a traffic light if stopped at an intersection, but at least double the brightness, and a deeper, perhaps bluish-tinted green. 

i know there are helicopters that fly to oil platforms offshore, and have even seen a military helicopter or a-10 (national guard) fly a path over this area, but those are almost perpendicular to the path of the ufo. there is another flight path for c-130's that sometimes fly in pairs at night, and there path is close (within 20-25 degrees), but there size, speed, sound, and "lighting pattern" are very distinctive.  

i didn't see nor hear any low-flying aircraft in the area (on the "drive in"). i estimate it was debris entering the atmosphere above indiana moving over iowa. 

this object stood-out as being something other than a traditional aircraft, and the it was different enough from known objects to warrent this report.
content.summary: Bright green "flare" at constant speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, looking up into the sky in the evening, and saw 4 white lights, quickly moving from south to north.  i first noticed them when they were almost directly overhead, and lost sight of them when they reached the horizon, about 3 seconds later. the 4 lights appeared to be connected as one object; they were very close together, and in a row perpendicular to the direction of travel.  there was no sound.  they were moving much faster than satellites appear to be moving. they were unlike any airplanes i have seen (moving too quickly; no sound; traveling in an unusual direction for the area).  i would like to know how to find out what it might have been.
content.summary: 4 white lights abreast, traveling as a unit, going north.

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at a traffic light at the corner of candelaria & wyoming here in albuquerque, nm on may 13, 2009 (approx noon), when i noticed what appeared to be several sizable pieces of clear plastic floating in the sky only slightly above the height of the stoplight. at first i assumed this was just litter in the wind but i noticed that these pieces were not falling to the ground or even descending that much at all.  rather they appeared to float around in a whirlwind type of motion consistently staying aloft.   i continued oberving this strange material until i noticed that the light had changed.  it piqued my curiosity at the time, but when i saw images of the supposed "nasa balloon" mistaken for a ufo over new mexico and arizona on may 18th i realized that what i saw was the same material.  clear floating plastic material that looks very much like a soap bubble.  only what i saw was not a balloon, but rather pieces of this material as if the balloon had popped and the debris was just floating around.  however nasa is caiming that the giant weather balloon blamed for these ufo sightings only launched on sunday, may 17th. so what is the explanation for several large pieces of this material floating over albuquerque, nm the prior wednesday? another giant clear weather balloon?
content.summary: Looked like pieces of clear balloon floating in sky, not descending.

content.detailedDescription: At the time i took the photo i was focused on the jet. i did not notice it until after i pulled the picture up on my computer. i was outside playing with my kids and took a quick shot of the jet flying over head, then i went back to taking photographs of them playing. it may be a bug..I do not know.
content.summary: I was outside playing with kids took a picture of a jet and noticed this in the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Looks like quite a few people have already reported this object, and it looked the same to me as they all describe.  around sunset, my wife and i and a few other people noticed it in the sky after a church meeting.  extremely bright and very stationary.  

i watched it all the way home; as the sky darkened, the object stayed lit up.  but i also noticed that the clouds were still lit up as well, which is, of course, because the sun was still shining at that altitude.  also on the way home, i noticed a tiny object dangling from the bottom of the large lit-up one, which was shaped like an upside-down tear drop.  pretty convinced at this point that it was a weather balloon, but the fact that it wasn't moving seemed very strange.

when i got home, i grabbed my digital camera and binoculars, and looked first through the binoculars.  the object looked very extraordinary and impressive, but absolutely a weather balloon.  i took some film footage of it just for fun (see attached).

the object stayed in the same position for well over an hour (still seemed strange), and then faded to orange, then black, as the evening sky darkened.  i was confused by the stationary aspect of the balloon, but read today on the web that balloons are sometimes floated to fairly high altitudes (1,500 feet or higher) while tethered to the ground.  obviously the case here...

admittedly, i do believe in "ufo's", though i don't believe they're visitors from other planets...  in the case of this particular sighting, it simply wasn't a "ufo" at all...  sorry...   :)
content.summary: Mohave county, az - ufo at sunset - mystery solved!!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving no. on l a cienaga blvd. in los angles, and stopped at a red light. i always look up, and do not think every flash, cloud etc. is a ufo. as i looked in the sky ahead of me i noticed a long white , tube like thing flying across the sky.( i thought it was a plane , but something about it  made me question myself. i noticed i didn't see the wing span like on a plane. it also seemed longer then a plane.) the light changed , i looked down for about 2 sec. and then looked back up again, and it was gone. the sky was clear, there were no clouds and my visual scope was clear from left to right.  there also were no buildings or trees etc. to block my sight. even if it were a plane , i would've been able to see it further-away in the sky. this really got my attention. i nearly drove into the next car ,cause i was so puzzled, fyi there was alot of traffic, we were moving very slowly, about 1 car length. i did keep looking for this object, i even thought during my first initial sight " that looks strange take a picture, even with my phone" but again it was not visible anymore. the main reason i am reporting this is  cause i am alittle confused as to what i saw, and if  anyone else in my area reported anything? i also like to mention i drive a convertible so my visual span was very wide.   had this thing not disappeared, i might have shrugged it off , but it clearly was not  anywhere around my airspace. i also live near lax and don't cry wolf everytime i see a light in the sky. i would also like to say my reason for looking up all the time is because in 1984(apprx ) in yonkers, ny on the toconic pkwy, cross county pkwy at around 1:30-am i did witness a  black square-edged  boomerang object , had 5 white lights, no nose, no tail, was very low , gliding slowly, floating, i literally  stopped my car on the 4 lane highway, got out and just stared at this huge , soundless thing, floating...... thinking how can it float so slow and not fall down? i flashed my  lights high-beam,  and i swear it started to turn and head towards  the pkwy. as a couple of cars passed, i was pointing up, and they also stopped , but we did not speak, they stopped up the road , ahead of where i was. as it came over the pkwy, is when i was thinking what is this, i crossed out all logical answers, and then noticed it had no nose , and no tail, like planes do, no red or grn lights, made no noise, and was so big i could not see the stars (sky )  while it was over me.. then it just turned back towards the direction it came from. i saw the underneath of it, it looked like the ceiling of an industrial plant.. pipes, crevices, tubing.. etc.. this is the moment in my life when the word ufo had a new meaning, and i no longer think ufo is a saucer, and unidentified flying object (ufo) means exactly what it stands for. as i stood out my car i got a rush of panic , i got very afraid suddenly and jumped in my car , and started to leave, i kept looking back as it floated away, again turning my head back  to look, and forward , acouple of times, but the last time i looked back it was gone. i dont think it disappeared, i think due to the shape , at a certain angle it blends with the sky. hence only a certain radius see the objects ... anyway thank-you for this opportunity to tell you my story. p.S. when i got home it was 1.5 hrs later then it should have been...??? i think i have lost time, people think im crazy when i tell'em my story, but no gain has come from my experience except my friends think im crazy.. and i lost a couple of dates  ...
content.summary: Tube like object flying across sky, caught my eye, looked away for 2 sec. looked back , object was gone.. no clouds , and open sky, left to right no plane or object insight , almost crashed cause i was confused.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my computer, waiting for it to boot, and i leaned back in my chair to look at the cloudless evening sky through the skylight directly overhead. we are generally surrounded by trees, so this is one of the few areas at my home i can see the sky. the skylight is large, about 4��� x 4���. while looking at the sky, i spotted two small dots of light (craft?) moving due east directly west. they were side by side, and appeared to be very close together. they appeared to be at a very high altitude, and were incredibly fast. the two lights crossed my field of view, which is about 50 degrees, in less than two seconds. just before moving out of my view, the two lights cris-crossed paths, but continued on the same vector. about one minute later, i saw a similar light(craft) moving at similar altitude/speed from nne to ssw. the lights reminded me of videos i���ve seen of space debris re-entering the atmosphere, but there were no contrails of any kind, and i���ve never seen pieces of debris cross paths and keep going the same direction. very interesting!
content.summary: Two lights then another cross sky in daylight.
